itunes:title: Car brokers Steve Serio & Cam Ingram
itunes:author: Matt Farah & Zack Klapman
itunes:summary:
Are barn finds dead? Are auctions manipulated? These guys have the info. Steve Serio (@therealbondgroup) and Cameron Ingram (@porsche_malone) help people find, buy, and maintain car worth 5, 6, or 8 figures. They enlighten us finding cars, buying cars, why owning vintage race cars is the worst great idea, and a LOT more. This is one of the funniest and most informative shows we've ever done. 

Check out Cameron's work at https://roadscholars.com/
